2202490.Description:
When dealing DMG, Infusion inflicts Laceration on the target.
Laceration: Takes 100% more DMG from Thorn in 2s.

2202500.Description: When <linktext=1532><style="ItemQuality_5">Regen Pulse</style></linktext> is actively used, it spreads <style="accent-gn">twice</style>.

2202510.Description: <style="accent-gn">Each</style> use or trigger of <linktext=1532><style="ItemQuality_5">Regen Pulse</style></linktext>, reduces the CD of <linktext=1535><style="ItemQuality_5">Nature Ward</style></linktext> by <style="accent-gn">2s</style>.

2202520.Description:
Regen Pulse returns to your position after it reaches the max distance.
Regen Pulse now deals DMG to enemies.

2202530.Description: <style="accent-gn">Each</style> <linktext=1108><style="ItemQuality_5">Regen Bud</style></linktext> gained, reduces the CD of <linktext=1529><style="ItemQuality_5">Feral Seed</style></linktext> by <style="accent-gn">1</style> second.

2202540.Description: <style="accent-gn">Symbiotic Mark</style> enhances Healingiveness by <style="accent-gn">2%</style>. Each <style="accent-gn">5%</style> Mastery enhances Healingiveness by <style="accent-gn">1%</style>.

2202550.Description: Each <linktext=1116><style="ItemQuality_5">Wild Seed</style></linktext> fired extends the duration of activated <style="accent-gn">Symbiotic Mark</style> by <style="accent-gn">1</style>second.

2202560.Description:
When dealing DMG, Infusion grants 1 stack of Pulse Echo.
Pulse Echo: Increases DMG dealt of Regen Pulse by 20%, which lasts 12s and stacks up to 5 times.

2202570.Description:
Lucky Strike DMG Multiplier +5%.
Every 1% Luck grants 1% Lucky Strike DMG Multiplier.

2202580.Description: For every <style="accent-gn">20</style> stacks of <style="accent-gn">Pulse Echo</style> gained, the next actively cast <linktext=1532><style="ItemQuality_5">Regen Pulse</style></linktext> triggers a <linktext=1533><style="ItemQuality_5">Blossom Charge</style></linktext> at both the nearest enemy and the Ally with lowest HP.

2202590.Description: When <linktext=1526><style="ItemQuality_5">Wild Bloom</style></linktext> or <linktext=1532><style="ItemQuality_5">Regen Pulse</style></linktext> deal DMG, grants a chance (equal to the <style="accent-gn">half</style> percentage of Luck) to gain <style="accent-gn">1</style> <linktext=1108><style="ItemQuality_5">Regen Bud</style></linktext>. If the target is affected by <linktext=1117><style="ItemQuality_5">Thorn</style></linktext>, doubles the chance.

2202600.Description:
If you're affected with Nourish, reduces all DMG taken by 10%.
If the targets are affected by Nourish, enhances their Healing Received from yourself by 5%. If the stack of Nourish is above or equal to 3, additionally enhances Healing Received by 3%.

2202620.Description: Using <linktext=1533><style="ItemQuality_5">Blossom Charge</style></linktext> enhances the next <linktext=1527><style="ItemQuality_5">Life Bloom</style></linktext>, skipping the cast and increasing the Healing by <style="accent-gn">50%</style>.

2202630.Description:
Nourish can stack up to 5 times.
Each use of Life Bloom grants the targets with Nourish 1 stack of Nourish.

2202640.Description: When holding <style="accent-gn">2</style> or more <linktext=1108><style="ItemQuality_5">Regen Buds</style></linktext>, casting <linktext=1533><style="ItemQuality_5">Blossom Charge</style></linktext> for damage or healing always triggers a corresponding seed (without costing <linktext=1108><style="ItemQuality_5">Regen Buds</style></linktext>) and grants <style="accent-gn">1</style> <linktext=1108><style="ItemQuality_5">Regen Bud</style></linktext>.

2202650.Description: Casting <linktext=1527><style="ItemQuality_5">Life Bloom</style></linktext> increases <linktext=1527><style="ItemQuality_5">Life Bloom</style></linktext>'s healing by <style="accent-gn">20%</style> and its <style="accent-gn">Energy</style> consumed by <style="accent-gn">10%</style> for <style="accent-gn">4s</style>. This effect can stack up to <style="accent-gn">5</style> times.

2202660.Description:
During Growth Arcane, increases Energy REG SPD by 50%.
Increases Grove Wish's Crit by 10%

2202690.Description:
Consumes Moonlight Solace to launch Flower Dance - Tricolor Revelation.
Flower Dance - Tricolor Revelation: Grants all effects of Flower Stalks, once every 60s.

2202700.Description: Every <style="accent-gn">45s</style>, generates <style="accent-gn">1</style> <style="accent-gn">Flower Stalk</style> in the following order: <linktext=1119><style="ItemQuality_5">Crimson Insight</style></linktext>, <linktext=1120><style="ItemQuality_5">Golden Devotion</style></linktext>, and <linktext=1121><style="ItemQuality_5">Moonlight Solace</style></linktext>.

2202710.Description: When a <style="accent-gn">Flower Stalk</style> appears, grants <style="accent-gn">1</style> <linktext=1108><style="ItemQuality_5">Regen Bud</style></linktext> every <style="accent-gn">2s</style> for <style="accent-gn">10s</style>.

2202730.Description:
Increases Max Energy by 20.
Using Blossom Charge restores 30% lost Energy.

2202740.Description: Healing <style="accent-gn">Expertise</style> restore <style="accent-gn">25%</style> more HP to the targets with HP below <style="accent-gn">50%</style>.

2202750.Description: Every <style="accent-gn">5</style> uses of <linktext=1527><style="ItemQuality_5">Life Bloom</style></linktext> accelerates the using of <linktext=1534><style="ItemQuality_5">Grove Wish</style></linktext> or <linktext=1532><style="ItemQuality_5">Regen Pulse</style></linktext> by <style="accent-gn">100%</style> and increases their Healing by <style="accent-gn">50%</style> in <style="accent-gn">15s</style>.

2201020.Description: For <style="accent-gn">8</style>s after you cast <linktext=1536><style="ItemQuality_5">Tectonic Ring</style></linktext>, each <style="accent-gn">Basic Attack</style> pulls a target between <style="accent-gn">8</style> and <style="accent-gn">20</style> meters away toward you. The same target cannot be pulled again within <style="accent-gn">3</style>s.

2201030.Description:
Increases Armor by 2000.
Every 3 points of Strength provides 2 Armor.

2201050.Description: When dealing DMG, <style="accent-gn">Basic Attacks</style> have a fixed <style="accent-gn">10%</style> chance to trigger <linktext=1123><style="ItemQuality_5">Weak Point Strike</style></linktext> once.

2201080.Description:
Successful Block restores 1% of your HP and 2 Rage. This can only occur once per second.
Triggering Lucky Block restores 2% of your HP and 4 Rage. This can only occur once per second.

2201090.Description:
A successful Block triggers a Countercrush, once per second.
On a Lucky Block, randomly triggers 1 to 3 Countercrush, once per second.

2201010.Description: After casting Sandgrip, gains <style="accent-gn">10%</style> Versatility for <style="accent-gn">10s</style>.

2201160.Description: A successful hit with <linktext=1540><style="ItemQuality_5">Shield Bash</style></linktext> reduces the target's DMG dealt to you by <style="accent-gn">3%</style> for <style="accent-gn">10</style>s, stacking up to <style="accent-gn">3</style> times.

2201170.Description: While shielded, use <style="accent-gn">Basic Attack</style> midair to slam down, detonating the shield and dealing damage equal to <style="accent-gn">30%</style> max HP to nearby enemies.

2201180.Description: Increases the effectiveness of Shield granted by <linktext=1540><style="ItemQuality_5">Shield Bash</style></linktext> by <style="accent-gn">30%</style>.

2201200.Description: <style="accent-gn">Basic Attacks</style> have a fixed <style="accent-gn">5%</style> chance to trigger <linktext=1127><style="ItemQuality_5">Shield Combo</style></linktext> upon dealing DMG. Each <style="accent-gn">1%</style> Mastery grants an extra <style="accent-gn">0.2%</style> chance.

2201210.Description: <style="accent-gn">Each</style> <style="accent-gn">Sand Crystal</style> consumed reduces the CD of <linktext=1542><style="ItemQuality_5">Stoneform</style></linktext> by <style="accent-gn">1</style>s.

2201220.Description: While shielded, <style="magic">Magic Damage</style> and Wind DMG you take are -<style="accent-gn">25%</style> and <style="accent-gn">50%</style> respectively.

2201240.Description: During <linktext=1541><style="ItemQuality_5">Sandshroud</style></linktext>, adding a shield to yourself via <linktext=1540><style="ItemQuality_5">Shield Bash</style></linktext> triggers <linktext=1128><style="ItemQuality_5">Shield Echo</style></linktext>.

2201250.Description:
When dealing DMG, Granite Fury has a 20% chance to allow your next Basic Attack to evolve into Rageblow. Each 2% Luck adds 1% chance.
After casting Rageblow, increases Block DMG Reduction by 10% for 10s.

2201270.Description: When HP falls below <style="accent-gn">30%</style>, triggers <linktext=1129><style="ItemQuality_5">Survival Instinct</style></linktext>, once every <style="accent-gn">60</style>s.

2201280.Description:
Each enemy within 3 meters increases your Block chance by 3%, up to 15%. (Doubles the effect against Elite or stronger enemies.) Remains unchanged when Earthfort Spec is active.
If Block Spec is activated, the effect becomes: Every enemy within 3 meters increases Block DMG Reduction by 1%, up to 5%. (Doubles the effect against Elite or stronger enemies.)

2201290.Description: When <linktext=1135><style="ItemQuality_5">Enraged</style></linktext>, you gain <style="accent-gn">30%</style> bonus Armor, decreasing by <style="accent-gn">5%</style> per second.

2201300.Description: Each enemy within <style="accent-gn">3</style> meters enhances the effectiveness of <linktext=1122><style="ItemQuality_5">Suppress</style></linktext> by <style="accent-gn">3%</style>, up to <style="accent-gn">15%</style>. This effect is doubled against Elite or stronger enemies.

2201310.Description: Consuming <style="accent-gn">Rage</style> has a chance to enter <linktext=1135><style="ItemQuality_5">Enraged</style></linktext> state for <style="accent-gn">5s</style>. The more <style="accent-gn">Rage</style> you consume, the higher the chance. <style="accent-gn">Each</style> <style="accent-gn">Rage</style> increases the chance by <style="accent-gn">1%</style>.

2201320.Description:
He crouched down and started digging with his hands.
Soon, he unearthed a box with a letter inside.

2201330.Description:
Further enhances Shield Bash.
Each additional enemy hit by Shield Bash increases its DMG by 30%, up to 150%.

Maintain your shield as much as possible. In addition to reducing DMG taken, certain effects can be triggered while a shield is active.

2201340.Description: <linktext=1536><style="ItemQuality_5">Tectonic Ring</style></linktext> generates a <linktext=1137><style="ItemQuality_5">Sandfield</style></linktext> that lasts for <style="accent-gn">5</style>s.

2201350.Description: When <linktext=1169><style="ItemQuality_5">Rageblow</style></linktext> deals DMG, it reduces the CD of <linktext=1543><style="ItemQuality_5">Brave Bastion</style></linktext> by <style="accent-gn">3</style>s.

2201360.Description: While in the <linktext=1543><style="ItemQuality_5">Brave Bastion</style></linktext> state, casting <linktext=1538><style="ItemQuality_5">Countercrush</style></linktext> or <linktext=1539><style="ItemQuality_5">Granite Fury</style></linktext> triggers <linktext=1136><style="ItemQuality_5">Sand Crystal Shock</style></linktext>.

2201370.Description: A successful <linktext=1170><style="ItemQuality_5">Block</style></linktext> grants a fixed <style="accent-gn">30%</style> chance for your next <linktext=1539><style="ItemQuality_5">Granite Fury</style></linktext> cast to consume no <style="accent-gn">Sand Crystals</style>. This effect can occur up to once every <style="accent-gn">3s</style>.

2201400.Description: When <style="accent-gn">Strength</style> reaches <style="accent-gn">500</style>, extends the duration of <linktext=1135><style="ItemQuality_5">Enraged</style></linktext> by <style="accent-gn">1</style> second.

2201410.Description: For each <style="accent-gn">1</style> <style="accent-gn">Sand Crystal</style> consumed, restore <style="accent-gn">1%</style> of Max HP.

2201420.Description: In the state of <linktext=1135><style="ItemQuality_5">Enraged</style></linktext>, attack speed +<style="accent-gn">8%</style>.

2201430.Description:
The charge count of Rage Burst +1.
While Enraged, Rage Burst and Terra Sunder become instant cast.

2201440.Description: Increases <linktext=1537><style="ItemQuality_5">Star Shatter</style></linktext> and <linktext=1594><style="ItemQuality_5">Starfall</style></linktext> DMG by <style="accent-gn">30%</style>, and guarantees <linktext=1135><style="ItemQuality_5">Enraged</style></linktext> status.

2201450.Description:
throughout the duration of Sandshroud, being attacked reduces the attack speed of enemy targets within a 5 meter radius by 30% for 3s.
throughout the duration of Sandshroud, Armor of allies within an 8 meter radius +10%.

2201460.Description: Upon the triggering of <linktext=1123><style="ItemQuality_5">Weak Point Strike</style></linktext>, gains <linktext=1124><style="ItemQuality_5">Amplified Earthfort</style></linktext>.

2201470.Description: During <linktext=1542><style="ItemQuality_5">Stoneform</style></linktext>, reduces all DMG taken by <style="accent-gn">10%</style>.

2201480.Description:
Enhances Shield effectiveness by 10%.
During Sandshroud, additionally enhances Shield effectiveness by 10%.

2201490.Description: <style="accent-gn">Each</style> successful hit of <style="accent-gn">Expertise Skill</style> or <style="accent-gn">Special Attack</style> increases <style="accent-gn">Strength</style> by <style="accent-gn">1%</style> in <style="accent-gn">5s</style>. The effect stacks up to <style="accent-gn">10</style> times. With <style="accent-gn">10</style> stacks, increases <style="accent-gn">Strength</style> by <style="accent-gn">10%</style> for <style="accent-gn">8s</style>. During this effect, the next <style="accent-gn">Expertise Skill</style> heals you for <style="accent-gn">20%</style> of the DMG dealt, yet no additional <style="accent-gn">Strength</style> stacks can be gained.

2201500.Description:
After casting Starfall Arcane, gain Rock Master.
Rock Master: For 15s, normal attacks evolve into 1 Arcane, and Rage Burst evolves into 1 Terra Sunder.

2201510.Description: Casting <linktext=1594><style="ItemQuality_5">Starfall</style></linktext> grants <style="accent-gn">Lord of Rock</style>: For <style="accent-gn">15s</style>, <style="accent-gn">Basic Attack</style> evolves into <style="accent-gn">1</style> <linktext=1595><style="ItemQuality_5">Rupture</style></linktext>, and <linktext=1544><style="ItemQuality_5">Rage Burst</style></linktext> evolves into <style="accent-gn">1</style> <linktext=1134><style="ItemQuality_5">Terra Sunder</style></linktext>.

2201520.Description: When <linktext=1537><style="ItemQuality_5">Star Shatter</style></linktext> or <linktext=1594><style="ItemQuality_5">Starfall</style></linktext> defeats a target, <linktext=1537><style="ItemQuality_5">Star Shatter </style></linktext>immediately recovers <style="accent-gn">1</style> charge.

2201530.Description: While <linktext=1135><style="ItemQuality_5">Enraged</style></linktext>, <linktext=1595><style="ItemQuality_5">Rupture</style></linktext> is bound to trigger <linktext=1123><style="ItemQuality_5">Weak Point Strike</style></linktext>.

2201540.Description: <linktext=1537><style="ItemQuality_5">Star Shatter</style></linktext> and <linktext=1594><style="ItemQuality_5">Starfall</style></linktext> deals additionally <style="accent-gn">200%</style> DMG to targets with current HP less than or equal to <style="accent-gn">35%</style>.

2201550.Description: Casting <linktext=1542><style="ItemQuality_5">Stoneform​</style></linktext> grants <style="accent-gn">Lord of Rock</style>: For <style="accent-gn">15s</style>, <style="accent-gn">Basic Attack</style> evolves into <style="accent-gn">1</style> <linktext=1595><style="ItemQuality_5">Rupture</style></linktext>, and <linktext=1544><style="ItemQuality_5">Rage Burst</style></linktext> evolves into <style="accent-gn">1</style><linktext=1134> <style="ItemQuality_5">Terra Sunder</style></linktext>.

2201560.Description: In combat, <style="accent-gn">50%</style> of overhealing converts to a shield (accumulated shield cannot exceed <style="accent-gn">50%</style> of Max HP).

2201570.Description:
Armor +5%.
Each attack of Terra Sunder deals an additional instance of Attack Damage to the target, equal to 100% Armor.

2201580.Description:
Replaces Special Attack with Countercrush, and enhances the ability.
When Lucky Block triggers, increases Block DMG Reduction by 10%.

Try to keep Countercrush active as much as possible. While it's active, part of incoming DMG can be blocked. High Luck allows parry to yield various buffs.

2201590.Description: <linktext=1539><style="ItemQuality_5">Granite Fury</style></linktext> DMG enhances <linktext=1126><style="ItemQuality_5">Lucky Block</style></linktext> DMG Reduction by <style="accent-gn">2%</style> for <style="accent-gn">8s</style>. Stacks up to <style="accent-gn">3</style> times.

2201600.Description: Successfully <linktext=1170><style="ItemQuality_5">Blocking</style></linktext> has a fixed <style="accent-gn">20%</style> chance to gain <style="accent-gn">1</style> <style="accent-gn">Sand Crystal</style>. If it was a <linktext=1126><style="ItemQuality_5">Lucky Block</style></linktext>, gain an additional <style="accent-gn">1</style> <style="accent-gn">Sand Crystal</style>.<linktext=1170><style="ItemQuality_5"></style></linktext>

2201610.Description:
Casting Granite Fury 10 times grants Heart of Rock.
Heart of Rock: For 10s, Granite Fury evolves into Stone Fist.
Casting Stone Fist guarantees Enraged status.

2201620.Description: After casting <linktext=1597><style="ItemQuality_5">Stone Fist</style></linktext>, for the next <style="accent-gn">10s</style>, summons <style="accent-gn">1</style> <linktext=1131><style="ItemQuality_5">Granite</style></linktext> every <style="accent-gn">2s</style>.

2201640.Description: <linktext=1597><style="ItemQuality_5">Stone Fist</style></linktext> restores <style="accent-gn">5%</style> max HP. For every <style="accent-gn">1</style> extra enemy hit, restores an additional <style="accent-gn">2%</style> max HP (up to a total of <style="accent-gn">15%</style>. Excess healing is converted into an equivalent Shield.

2201650.Description: While <linktext=1543><style="ItemQuality_5">Brave Bastion</style></linktext> is active, taking DMG doubles <linktext=1125><style="ItemQuality_5">Countercrush</style></linktext> DMG.

2201670.Description: When <linktext=1131><style="ItemQuality_5">Granite</style></linktext> deals DMG, there is a chance, of which equals Lucky Strike Chance, to summon <style="accent-gn">an additional</style> <linktext=1131><style="ItemQuality_5">Granite</style></linktext>.

2201680.Description: When <linktext=1131><style="ItemQuality_5">Granite</style></linktext> hits a target, it reduces all DMG taken by <style="accent-gn">10%</style> for the next <style="accent-gn">5s</style>.

2201690.Description: Summoning <style="accent-gn">20</style> <linktext=1131><style="ItemQuality_5">Granites</style></linktext> grants <style="accent-gn">Heart of Rock</style>: For <style="accent-gn">10s</style>, <linktext=1539><style="ItemQuality_5">Granite Fury</style></linktext> evolves into <linktext=1597><style="ItemQuality_5">Stone Fist</style></linktext>.

2201700.Description: For <style="accent-gn">10s</style> after casting <linktext=1536><style="ItemQuality_5">Tectonic Ring</style></linktext>, trigger <style="accent-gn">1</style> <linktext=1125><style="ItemQuality_5">Countercrush</style></linktext> every <style="accent-gn">2s</style>.

2201720.Description:
Increases Mastery by 600.
While Brave Bastion is active, increases Mastery by 8%.

2201730.Description: While <linktext=1135><style="ItemQuality_5">Enraged</style></linktext>, increases Lucky Strike Chance by <style="accent-gn">10%</style>.

2203010.Description:
Increases Max Photon Energy by 20, extending the duration of Photon Reforge. Unaffected when Wildpack Spec is active.
If Falconry Spec is activated, the effect becomes: Max Photon Energy -20 but Photon Reforge state can be entered more quickly.

2203020.Description: Every <style="accent-gn">10</style> points of <style="accent-gn">Agility</style> provide <style="accent-gn">2</style> point of Haste.

2203030.Description:
Dealing DMG grants a fixed 30% chance to apply Vulnerability to the enemy.
Vulnerability: Increases the DMG you deal to the target by 10% for 5s.

2203040.Description:
Tames a Wild Wolf to fight alongside you. Storm Arrow has a 30% fixed chance to trigger Coordinated Attack.

Wild Wolf
A Wild Wolf fights alongside you.
Basic Attack: Sweeps the enemy, dealing Attack Damage equal to 60% ATK (which scales with the Level/Tier of your Basic Attack).
Coordinated Attack: Wild Wolf leaps to the enemy and bites, dealing Attack Damage equal to 100% ATK (which scales with the Level/Tier of your Basic Attack).

2203050.Description: For every <style="accent-gn">15</style> <style="accent-gn">Special Attacks</style> cast, <style="accent-gn">Photon Energy</style> granted by the next cast of <linktext=1550><style="ItemQuality_5">Arrow Rain</style></linktext> +<style="accent-gn">100%</style>.

2203060.Description: While <linktext=1549><style="ItemQuality_5">Wildcall</style></linktext> is active, the <style="accent-gn">Wild Wolf</style> is bound to deal Crit DMG on hit.

2203070.Description: When the <style="accent-gn">Wild Wolf</style> deals Crit DMG, you and your Companion gain <style="accent-gn">2%</style> Haste. This bonus lasts for <style="accent-gn">10</style>s and can layerup to <style="accent-gn">5</style> times.

2203080.Description:
While in Photon Reforge, Photon Energy drain per second is reduced from 25 to 20, allowing the effect to last longer. Unaffected when Wildpack Spec is active.
If Falconry Spec is activated, the effect becomes: Photon Energy regeneration is increased from 2 to 3 points per second, reducing the time required to enter Photon Reforge.

2203090.Description:
When Wild Wolf launches a Coordinated Attack, or Tail Sweep, there is a fixed 30% chance to summon a Phantom Direwolf using Pounce and Bite to attack the current enemy.
Pounce and Bite inflicts Bleed, and if the target is already suffered from Bleed, Pounce and Bite deals Crit DMG.

2203100.Description: <style="accent-gn">Wild Wolf</style>'s <style="accent-gn">Coordinated Attack</style> has a <style="accent-gn">50%</style> fixed chance to inflict <linktext=1141><style="ItemQuality_5">Bleed</style></linktext>.

2203110.Description: When <linktext=1601><style="ItemQuality_5">Storm Arrow</style></linktext> deals DMG in battle, it has a fixed <style="accent-gn">10%</style> chance to summon a <style="accent-gn">Wild Wolf</style> for <style="accent-gn">8</style>s. This effect can occur once every <style="accent-gn">40s</style>.

2203120.Description: While <linktext=1138><style="ItemQuality_5">Photon Reforge</style></linktext> is active, the <style="accent-gn">Wild Wolf</style>'s <style="accent-gn">Coordinated Attack</style> nullifies the target's Armor.

2203130.Description: <linktext=1546><style="ItemQuality_5">Luminary Bolt</style></linktext> additionally causes a <style="accent-gn">Photon</style> Explosion, dealing <style="physical">Attack Damage</style> equal to <style="accent-gn">1,500%</style> ATK (which scales with the Level/Tier of Ultimate), and also knocks targets airborne and increases the DMG you deal to them by <style="accent-gn">5%</style> for <style="accent-gn">10s</style>.

2203140.Description: While <linktext=1138><style="ItemQuality_5">Photon Reforge</style></linktext> is active, for <style="accent-gn">each</style> Companion on the battlefield, <linktext=1601><style="ItemQuality_5">Storm Arrow</style></linktext> fires <style="accent-gn">1</style> extra <linktext=1142><style="ItemQuality_5">Lightseeker Arrow</style></linktext>.

2203160.Description:
Applies Swiftness to the Falcon when casting Lightning Strike.
Swiftness: Increases Attack SPD by 10%. This effect lasts 8s and stacks up to 3 times.

2203180.Description: For every <style="accent-gn">3</style> instances of Crit DMG dealt by <style="accent-gn">Special Attacks</style>, the <style="accent-gn">Falcon</style> instantly launches <linktext=1143><style="ItemQuality_5">Lightning Strike</style></linktext>.

2203190.Description:
When the Falcon strikes, grants you a fixed 30% chance to gain 1 stack of Weak Point Aim.
Using Quadraflare leaves behind a Radiance Rift midair. Radiance Rift fires Photon Arrows equal to the current number of Weak Point Aim stacks.

2203200.Description: Increases the Crit of <linktext=1547><style="ItemQuality_5">Double Arrow</style></linktext> and <linktext=1557><style="ItemQuality_5">Quadraflare</style></linktext> by <style="accent-gn">7%</style>.

2203210.Description: The <style="accent-gn">Falcon</style> nullifies <style="accent-gn">20%</style> of the targets' Armor.

2203220.Description:
Each 1% critical rate increases Crit DMG by 0.3%.
When Double Arrow or Quadraflare deals Crit DMG, 2 Photon Energy is restored.

2203230.Description: <style="accent-gn">Every</style> target hit grants <style="accent-gn">1%</style> Light DMG bonus. The bonus lasts <style="accent-gn">3</style>s and can layerup to <style="accent-gn">4</style> times.

2203240.Description: Companions deal <style="accent-gn">15%</style> more DMG to Elites or stronger enemies.

2203250.Description: When <style="accent-gn">Basic Attacks</style> deal DMG, there is a <style="accent-gn">5%</style> fixed chance to instantly grant <style="accent-gn">Special Attack</style> 1 charge, up to the maximum charge limit.

2203260.Description:
Further enhances Storm Arrow and the Wild Wolf's power.

3401139.Description: Deals <style="physical">Attack Damage</style> equal to <style="accent-gn">80%</style> ATK to enemies within <style="accent-gn">5</style> meters. For each additional enemy hit, increases the DMG dealt by <style="accent-gn">30%</style> (which scales with the Level/Tier of <style="accent-gn">Basic Attack</style>, up to +<style="accent-gn">120%</style>).

3401140.Description: Deals <style="physical">Attack Damage</style> equal to <style="accent-gn">100%</style> ATK to an enemy and inflicts <style="accent-gn">Bleed</style>.

3401141.Description: The effect lasts <style="accent-gn">5s</style>, dealing <style="physical">Attack Damage</style> equal to <style="accent-gn">10%</style> ATK per second. If applied again from the same source before the previous <style="accent-gn">Bleed</style> ends, it deals all remaining DMG of the previous <style="accent-gn">Bleed</style> immediately.

3401142.Description: Deals <style="physical">Attack Damage</style> equal to <style="accent-gn">50%</style> ATK to the enemy.

3401143.Description: Deals <style="physical">Attack Damage</style> equal to <style="accent-gn">350%</style> ATK to the enemy.

3401144.Description: Deals <style="physical">Attack Damage</style> equal to <style="accent-gn">100%</style> ATK to enemies within <style="accent-gn">3</style> meters.

3401145.Description: Deals <style="physical">Attack Damage</style> equal to <style="accent-gn">250%</style> ATK to the enemies within range.

3401146.Description: Flaps its wings on the spot, enhancing the effectiveness of Haste by <style="accent-gn">30%</style> for <style="accent-gn">10s</style>.

3401147.Description: Lets out a fierce howl, increasing Light bonus by <style="accent-gn">50%</style> for <style="accent-gn">10s</style>.

3401148.Description: When the stacks of <style="accent-gn">Steel Beak</style> reach <style="accent-gn">5</style> or more, grants a fixed <style="accent-gn">30%</style> chance to trigger an <style="accent-gn">Implosion</style> each time a new stack is gained, dealing <style="physical">Attack Damage</style> equal to <style="accent-gn">60%</style> ATK to the enemies within range. <style="accent-gn">The Steel Beak effect</style> stacks up to <style="accent-gn">20</style> times, and loses <style="accent-gn">1</style> stack <style="accent-gn">per second</style>.

3401149.Description: Creates a storm with a <style="accent-gn">5</style>-meter radius, dealing <style="accent-gn">80%</style> ATK as <style="magic">Attack Damage</style> ignoring Armor to targets marked with <style="accent-gn">Steel Beak</style> inside the storm every <style="accent-gn">0</style>.<style="accent-gn">5s</style>. After <style="accent-gn">5s</style>, <style="accent-gn">Celestial Eagle</style> dives to the ground, dealing <style="accent-gn">500%</style> ATK as <style="magic">Attack Damage</style> ignoring Armor.

3401150.Description: Deals <style="physical">Attack Damage</style> equal to <style="accent-gn">400%</style> ATK to the enemy.

3401151.Description: Deals <style="physical">Attack Damage</style> equal to <style="accent-gn">35%</style> ATK to the enemy (which scales with the Level/Tier of <style="accent-gn">Basic Attack</style>).

3401153.Description: Target loses HP equal to <style="accent-gn">25%</style> ATK per second for <style="accent-gn">8s</style>.

3401156.Description: Luck Effect: Deals <style="physical">Attack Damage</style> equal to <style="accent-gn">150%</style> ATK.

3401157.Description: DMG of <style="accent-gn">Instant Edge</style> <style="accent-gn">+30%</style> for <style="accent-gn">10s</style>. It stacks up to <style="accent-gn">2</style> times and 1 stack is consumed after the use of <style="accent-gn">Instant Edge</style>.

3401158.Description: Deals <style="physical">Attack Damage</style> equal to <style="accent-gn">350%</style> ATK to the enemies within range. DMG reduces by <style="accent-gn">20%</style> with each attack, down to 40% of the original Damage. Each Tornado maintains independent.

3401159.Description: An enhanced version of <style="accent-gn">Sharp Impact</style>. Leaps into the air, dealing <style="physical">Attack Damage</style> equal to <style="accent-gn">800%</style> ATK in total to the target and surrounding enemies (which scales with the Level/Tier of <style="accent-gn">Sharp Impact</style>)

3401160.Description: When Ice Meteor deals DMG, <style="accent-gn">Ice Core</style> fires <style="accent-gn">Ice Arrow</style>, granting 1 <style="accent-gn">Frost Crystal</style>.

3401161.Description: Grants extra effects to certain skills.

3401162.Description: Deals <style="magic">Magic Damage</style> equal to <style="accent-gn">100%</style> ATK to the target.

3401163.Description: Deals <style="magic">Magic Damage</style> equal to <style="accent-gn">100%</style> ATK to enemies within <style="accent-gn">3</style> meters.

3401164.Description: Throws a <style="accent-gn">Frost Lance</style> that pierces targets, dealing <style="magic">Magic Damage</style> equal to <style="accent-gn">250%</style> ATK.

3401165.Description: Luck Effect: Summon a <style="accent-gn">Frost Comet</style> from the sky, dealing <style="magic">Magic Damage</style> equal to <style="accent-gn">200%</style> ATK to the enemy.

3401166.Description: Unleashes a powerful pulse from the Frost Ray, dealing <style="magic">Magic Damage</style> equal to <style="accent-gn">500%</style> ATK to enemies it hits.

3401167.Description:
Gains 2 Blade Intent per second. Starts with a Max of 100 Blade Intent.
When Blade Intent reaches 100, greatly accelerates the using of Iaido Slash. Using Iaido Slash consumes 100 Blade Intent.
Blade Intent can also be used as a resource for Thundercut.

3401168.Description: Enhances <style="accent-gn">Shield</style> effectiveness by <style="accent-gn">3%</style>. The effect lasts <style="accent-gn">10s</style> and stacks up to <style="accent-gn">10</style> times.

3401169.Description: Jumps and deals <style="physical">Attack Damage</style> equal to <style="accent-gn">400%</style> ATK to enemies within range. Always triggers <style="accent-gn">Weakness Strike</style> (which scales with the Level/Tier of <style="accent-gn">Basic Attack</style>).

3401170.Description: Grants a chance to <style="accent-gn">block</style> <style="physical">Attack Damage</style> and to reduce it by <style="accent-gn">30%</style>.

3401171.Description: Immobilizes the target and increases Ice DMG taken by <style="accent-gn">20%</style> for <style="accent-gn">10s</style>. The effect breaks upon taking DMG. Rapidly applying this effect within a short duration will reduce its total duration. Does not affect bosses.

3401172.Description: Infuses the Shield with light, absorbing <style="accent-gn">50%</style> of incoming DMG. The effect can stack absorption and reset duration when the Skill is reused. Max absorption cannot exceed <style="accent-gn">100%</style> of Max HP.

3401173.Description: Restores HP equal to <style="accent-gn">20%</style> ATK for allies every <style="accent-gn">0.5s</style> for <style="accent-gn">5s</style>

3401174.Description: Deals <style="physical">Attack Damage</style> equal to <style="accent-gn">150%</style> ATK to the enemy.

3401175.Description: Each stack increases Max HP by <style="accent-gn">2%</style>, and <style="accent-gn">Lightforged Barrier</style> stacks up to <style="accent-gn">10</style> times. Any incoming DMG consumes <style="accent-gn">1</style> stack. The effect lasts <style="accent-gn">25s</style> or until all stacks are consumed. Duration resets each time a new stack is gained.

3401176.Description:
Deals Attack Damageequal to 240% ATK to target, which scales with the Level/Tier of Vanguard Strike.
When Vanguard Hunt deals DMG, restores 2% of Max HP and grants Indomitable Courage.

3401177.Description: Deal <style="physical">Attack Damage</style> equal to <style="accent-gn">50%</style> ATK and reduces the target's movement speed by <style="accent-gn">25%</style>.

3401180.Description: Fires a string note at a nearby enemy/ally, dealing DMG/healing equal to <style="accent-gn">50%</style> of the Beat Performer's MATK.

3401182.Description: Deals <style="physical">Attack Damage</style> equal to <style="accent-gn">50%</style> *stacks of ATK per second for <style="accent-gn">10s</style>.

3401185.Description: Applies healing to nearby friendly targets, equal to <style="accent-gn">10%</style> of the Beat Performer's MATK.

3401188.Description: Deals <style="accent-gn">80%</style> ATK <style="physical">Attack Damage</style> to enemy targets.

3401189.Description: Deals <style="accent-gn">300%</style> ATK <style="magic">Magic Damage</style> to enemy targets around self.

3401190.Description: Deals <style="magic">Magic Damage</style> equal to <style="accent-gn">60%</style> ATK to the enemies within range (which scales with the Level/Tier of <style="accent-gn">Basic Attack</style>).

3401191.Description: Unleashes a fiery shockwave in a <style="accent-gn">5</style>-meter radius around yourself, dealing <style="magic">Magic Damage</style> equal to <style="accent-gn">100%</style> ATK to enemies hit.

3401192.Description: Restores HP equal to <style="accent-gn">35%</style> ATK in total within <style="accent-gn">10s</style>. When a <style="accent-gn">Note</style> is granted again, it immediately triggers the remaining healing of the previous <style="accent-gn">Note</style>.

3401193.Description: Each time a damage or healing <style="accent-gn">Expertise Skill</style> is cast, there is a fixed <style="accent-gn">50%</style> chance to trigger <style="accent-gn">Encore Strings</style> once, either dealing DMG to the current target or healing the ally with the lowest HP (Party Members Prioritized).

3401194.Description: Moves and channels for 6s, continuously casting Passion Burst forward.

3401195.Description: Instantly gains <style="accent-gn">100</style> <style="accent-gn">Energy</style> and resets the CD of all healing <style="accent-gn">Expertise</style> immediately. Increases MATK by <style="accent-gn">30%</style> for <style="accent-gn">10s</style>.

3401196.Description: Raises the Shield and charges forward, dealing <style="physical">Attack Damage</style> equal to <style="accent-gn">200%</style> ATK to any enemies hit.

3401197.Description: Deals <style="magic">Magic Damage</style> equal to <style="accent-gn">100%</style> ATK to the enemies within range.

3401198.Description: After <style="accent-gn">10s</style>, unleashes a burst of Holy <style="accent-gn">Energy</style> around, dealing Attack Damage equal to <style="accent-gn">500%</style> of <style="physical">ATK</style> and restoring <style="accent-gn">15%</style> of Max HP.

3401199.Description: The target takes DMG equal to <style="accent-gn">20%</style> ATK every second for the next <style="accent-gn">10s</style>. During this time, each time the target deals DMG to you, there is a fixed <style="accent-gn">10%</style> chance to restore HP equal to <style="accent-gn">0.5%</style> of your Max HP.

3403000.Description: Interrupts the target's casting and puts the interrupted skill on CD. Does not affect bosses.

3403001.Description: Prevents the enemy from casting spells. Does not affect bosses. This is a debuff.

3403002.Description: Prevents the enemy from moving. Does not affect bosses. This is a debuff.

3403003.Description: Reduces the enemy's Move SPD by <style="accent-gn">30%</style>.

3403004.Description: Reduces the amount of healing the enemy receives. This is a debuff.

3403005.Description: Prevents the enemy from taking any actions. Does not affect bosses. This is a status effect.

3403006.Description: Prevents the enemy from taking any actions. The effect is removed upon receiving DMG. Does not affect bosses. This is a status effect.

3403007.Description: Prevents the enemy from taking any actions. The effect is removed upon receiving DMG. Does not affect bosses. This is a status effect.

3403008.Description: Prevents the enemy from taking any actions. The effect is removed upon receiving DMG. Does not affect bosses. This is a status effect.

3403009.Description: Forces the enemy to move into melee range of their current target to attack. Does not affect bosses. This is a status effect.

3403010.Description: The enemy cowers in place in fear. The effect is removed upon receiving DMG. Does not affect bosses. This is a status effect.

3403011.Description: Reduces the enemy's Move SPD. Does not affect bosses. This is a debuff.

3403012.Description: Causes the enemy to continuously lose HP. This is a debuff.

3403013.Description: Causes the enemy to continuously lose HP. This is a debuff.

3403014.Description: Causes the enemy to continuously lose HP. This is a debuff.
